thread.section_title: Rentalcars.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rentalcars.com | www.rentalcars.com
thread.title: Melody Gray

author: Melody Gray
title: Melody Gray
text: We were flying into Chicago so I put O'Hare as the rental center. We got a great price and was happy until we got to the rental car facility. They said the reservation had been made for the downtown facility and not the airport. At 5am, after a red eye flight we did not want to get a cab downtown so we ended up paying over double for our rental car. We will probably not use this site again.
